about_the_game:
The Fallen Seeds Artbook is a collection of character concepts, backgrounds, and illustrations that you can see directly in the game, as well as their sketches and early versions. This artbook offers a unique insight into the game's creation process, showing how key elements evolved and changed throughout development.

Additionally, the DLC consists of the artbook itself available in PDF format and a set of UHD PNG images that can be used as desktop wallpapers.

Purchasing this artbook not only allows you to enjoy the beautiful illustrations but also serves as a way to support the developers and express your appreciation for their work.

Key Features:

  • Character, background, and illustration concepts from the game
  • Sketches and early versions of art materials
  • A set of PNG images for use as desktop wallpapers
  • All illustrations created by the project artist Alice Makoveeva
